title: What are the requirements for skipping a division?
body: I have skipped numerous time, but I want to know the EXACT requirements for being able to skip divisions. I can't seem to be able to find it online.

replies.body: Its true that your mmr is hidden, however you will know that you are able to skip from the winning streak that you have, from your summoner name  the icon of 'hot streak' is given to you from winning three in a row, it either enables you to skip a division or not depending on the winning streak that you are in or that your mmr is high enough to do so.
If your MMR is 2 divisions higher than your current rank you will skip.

there isn't an exact requirement because MMR is hidden. A vague estimate is super high MMR compared to your current division. A less vague estimate would be the MMR of a player in the 3-4 divisions above you.
